CourseOfferingPtcpResult.name: CourseOfferingPtcpResult
CourseOfferingPtcpResult.description: Represents the outcome of a student's participation in a course.

CourseOfferingParticipantId.description: The Course Offering Participant associated with the Course Offering Participant Result.

DurationUnit.description: The unit of measurement for completion of the course.

EvaluatorContactId.description: The Contact that assigns the result associated with the Course Offering Participant Result.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether the record is locked (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LetterGrade.description: The letter grade awarded to the participant for completing the course.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether the record can be edited (true) or not (false).

Name.description: Course Offering Participant Result auto-generated name.

NumericGrade.description: The value that's assigned to a Letter Grade.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

ParticipantResultStatus.description: Specifies the type or status of the participant's result. For example, Pass or Fail.

UnitsEarned.description: Units of value awarded for completing the course.
